user.title: Firewalla MSP Setup
user.description: Configure your Firewalla integration to control firewall rules. You'll need your MSP domain and personal access token.

data_description.msp_url: Your Firewalla MSP domain (e.g., mydomain.firewalla.net or https://mydomain.firewalla.net)
data_description.access_token: Your personal access token from the Firewalla MSP account

box_selection.title: Select Firewalla Box
box_selection.description: Choose which Firewalla box to manage rules for. The integration will discover all existing rules and create switch entities for each one.

data_description.box_gid: Select the Firewalla box whose rules you want to control

error.invalid_url_format: MSP URL should be in format 'mydomain.firewalla.net' or 'https://mydomain.firewalla.net'
error.auth_failed: Invalid access token. Please check your token in MSP settings.
error.connection_failed: Cannot connect to MSP service. Please check your internet connection and MSP URL. Make sure the domain is correct.
error.no_boxes: No Firewalla boxes found in your MSP account. Please ensure your box is properly registered.
error.rule_access_failed: Cannot access rules. Please check your MSP permissions.
error.timeout: Connection timed out. Please try again.
error.unknown_error: An unexpected error occurred. Please check your configuration.
error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to Firewalla MSP API. Please check your MSP URL and network connection.
error.invalid_auth: Invalid MSP API credentials. Please verify your personal access token.
error.unknown: An unexpected error occurred. Please check the Home Assistant logs for details.

abort.already_configured: This Firewalla box is already configured. Each box can only be configured once.
abort.invalid_host: The provided MSP URL is not valid. Please check the URL format.
abort.auth_failed: Authentication with the Firewalla MSP API failed. Please check your credentials.

pause_rule.name: Pause Rule
pause_rule.description: Pause an existing Firewalla rule while preserving it for future use.

unpause_rule.name: Unpause Rule
unpause_rule.description: Unpause a previously paused Firewalla rule.

auth_failed.message: Authentication with Firewalla MSP API failed. Please check your credentials in the integration configuration.

connection_error.message: Cannot connect to Firewalla MSP API. Please check your network connection and MSP URL.

rate_limit.message: Firewalla MSP API rate limit exceeded. Please wait before making more requests.

rule_not_found.message: The specified Firewalla rule was not found. It may have been deleted or is no longer accessible.

rule_operation_failed.message: Failed to pause/unpause Firewalla rule. Please check the rule status and try again.
